meanings.definition: Not limited or restricted in scope, extent, or size.
meanings.sent1: The possibilities in the vast universe are unbounded.
meanings.sent2: Her imagination was unbounded, allowing her to dream big.
meanings.sent3: The unbounded energy of the puppy kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: His unbounded enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The unbounded ocean stretched out endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: Not confined or restricted within certain limits.
meanings.sent1: The unbounded field extended as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: The unbounded sky above us was filled with stars.
meanings.sent3: The unbounded joy of the children playing in the park was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Her unbounded love for her family knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unbounded forest seemed to go on forever.

meanings.definition: Not subject to constraints or limitations.
meanings.sent1: His unbounded creativity led to groundbreaking inventions.
meanings.sent2: The unbounded freedom of the open road was exhilarating.
meanings.sent3: The unbounded laughter of the friends echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: Her unbounded courage in the face of danger was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unbounded potential of the human mind is truly remarkable.
